name: SamTrans
description: Summer Youth Pass: unlimited local bus rides Juneâ€“August
fullDescription: SamTrans offers a special Summer Youth Pass for young riders, making it easy and affordable for youth to travel throughout San Mateo County during summer months.
whatTheyOffer:
- Summer Youth Pass: Unlimited local bus rides June through August
- Valid on all SamTrans local routes
- Affordable flat rate for entire summer
- Great for summer activities, jobs, and recreation
howToGetIt:
1. Purchase Summer Youth Pass before or during summer
2. Available at SamTrans sales outlets and online
3. Must be 18 years old or younger
4. Load pass onto Clipper card
5. Valid June 1 through August 31
